name: Bet 'n' Die 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In a distant future, a unique competition has emerged : Bet 'n' Die. It is the ultimate interplanetary sporting event, where the most daring gamblers compete in an arena by piloting fighting robots, staking their honour and their fortune.

Platform: PC 
Engine: Unreal Engine 4.26
Number of player: 4

Linkedin : https://fr.linkedin.com/company/bet-n-die 

Producer : Tristan DEROCHE, Maxime PERRIN
Game Art : Edwin VORNG, Marion BLIN, Roman DUVIVIER, Victor LOPEZ, Zoë CHAPLAIN
Game Design : Jean CHOUPAY, Jonathan BERGOZ, Martin ROSSEL, Natacha LEONARD
Game Design & Programming : Clément VIEILLY, Enguerran COBERT, Joël VOIGNIER
Game Programming : Adel HALES, Baptiste RIMETZ, Nathan LEPEC, Théophile SCHAFFNER
Music & Sound Design : Baptiste DENOUX, Mattéo SISCARO

Voice Actors : Pierre-Alain de GARRIGUES (FR), Lemmy CONSTANTINE (EN)
Musicians : Thilo GOLUZA (Piano / Keyboard), Régis MOREAU (Saxophone)
